Pre-Game Insights: Greene has a hit in 93 of 143 games this year (65.0%), with at least two hits in 35 of those contests (24.5%).
He has homered in 21 of 143 games in 2024 (14.7%), which is 4.1% of his trips to the plate.
Greene has touched home plate at least one time 62 times this season in 143 tries (43.4%), including scoring multiple runs in 11.9% of games (17 times).

In 34.3% of his 143 games this season, he has picked up an RBI (49 times). He’s also put up 15 games with multiple RBI in 2024 (10.5%) and driven in three or more of his team’s runs in eight contests.
Greene is 0-for-3 in his career versus Matthew Boyd.
Greene is 0-for-2 when facing off against Matthew Boyd this season.
